img_summary: The image depicts a formula or recipe document from the video game "Black Myth: Wukong." This document is related to various medicinal concoctions that players can acquire in the game. Specifically, the preceding and following text mentions formulas for Longevity Decoction, Tonifying Decoction, Fortifying Medicament, and Body-Fleeting Powder, which are obtained through different quests and interactions with the character Xu Dog in various locations and chapters of the game.
